---
title: Machine learning in Julia with Flux
subtitle: Example classifying the MNIST database
author: Marie-Hélène Burle
---

:::{.def}


This webinar, aimed at users with no experience in machine learning, is an introduction to the basic concepts of neural networks, followed by a simple example—the classic classification of the [MNIST database](http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/) of handwritten digits—using the Julia package [Flux](https://fluxml.ai/).

:::
